ioformat

Class FileUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.FileUtil

  • public class FileUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility methods for creating and copying files, so that it is not a problem when the parent of the target does not exist.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FileUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      static void copyFile(java.io.File original, java.io.File copy)
      This method copies the provided file.

      Creates the target directory, regardless of whether its parent directories exist.
      static void createFile(java.io.File targetFile)
      Creates the target file, regardless of whether its parent directories exist.
      static void createFileFromPath(java.lang.String targetPath)
      Creates the target file, regardless of whether its parent directories exist.
      static void fetchFileNamesRecursively(java.lang.String dirPath, java.io.PrintWriter pw)
      Fetch file names recursively and print them to a stream.

      • createFileFromPath

        public static void createFileFromPath(java.lang.String targetPath)
                               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the target file, regardless of whether its parent directories exist. It creates them if they don't.
        Parameters:
        targetPath - String that is the path of the target file to create.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • createDirectory

        public static void createDirectory(java.io.File targetDir)
                            throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        targetDir - File that is the target directory to create.
        Throws:

      • fetchFileNamesRecursively

        public static void fetchFileNamesRecursively(java.lang.String dirPath,
                             java.io.PrintWriter pw)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Fetch file names recursively and print them to a stream.
        Parameters:
        dirPath - Directory to fetch the names from.
        pw - PrintWriter that is the stream to write the names to.

        java.lang.Exception
